Name: Mystic Energy: Illusion of Heaven, Earth and Human
Desc:
Become enlightened in the magical arts to create special illusions that can create a chain of different elements. When any direct attack skill by Ho Young hits an enemy (except False/True Skills), an illusion appears and attacks with a non-chained elemental attack to complete the chain.
While the active effect is applied, reaching Elemental Chain Lv.3 resets one of the Heave/Earth/Human magic. If an element is selected, that element's skill cooldown is prioritized.
Mystic Energy: Illusion of Heaven, Earth and Human does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
